Events that occurred on 23 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien faces a Medical Board in Birmingham, but he is not deemed fit to return to war.
1939 - The Brothers Hildebrandt are born.
2020 - Barbara Remington, cover artist on some American editions, dies.
2021 - Tolkien and the Classical World is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
